advisory: Panicle initiation, Panicle emergence, flowering, and milking stages are critical stages. Avoid water deficit during these stages.
Cover the rows with dry leaves in Sugarcane. Top-dress with 4% potassium to protect the crop from water scarcity during summer.
High temperature increases the water requirement of maize crop. Irrigate the crop and avoid stagnant water.
High temperature may lead to wilting in tomato. Apply 1g Streptocyclin in 10 liters of water in the root zone.
Control Brinjal shoot and fruit borer by installing pheromone traps and spraying neem-based pesticide.
Mulch coconut leaves 1.8m around a coconut tree to reduce water loss.
Cover with paper caps on newly planted vegetable seedlings during daytime.
In shallow ponds, harvest fingerlings if water temperature rises to 30Â°C. Ensure enough water depth before introducing fingerlings.
